name.japanese: フランキーのヘビーヌンチャク

description: Massive nunchaku crafted from two stone pillars. These oversized weapons are wielded by Franky and can be borrowed by other crew members for specialized attacks. Heavy enough to deliver devastating blows to giant opponents.
abilities: Can be used as a blunt weapon with massive impact force
Zoro can pierce his swords into them to create an even more powerful weapon
Effective against giant opponents like Oars

keyMoments.description: Zoro borrowed the Heavy Nunchaku and used them with his Dai Gekken technique to strike Oars' arm.
keyMoments.significance: First time shown being used in collaboration with another crew member's technique.

historicalSignificance: Demonstrates Franky's ability to create powerful weapons and the crew's willingness to share equipment for tactical advantage.
